text: 16 week mentoring/training program in Open Research, for people with a project that they either are already working on or want to develop during this program individually or in teams. Project ideas can range from solving technical questions  to creating an open data project or report, developing an open source software project, writing an open publication, facilitating community/team culture movements, advancing open educational resources or contributing to other existing projects/communities. <https://twitter.com/openlifesci/status/1404532541302919178>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/openlifesci|@openlifesci>: Hey folks - we're mega excited to announce that round four of our open research training program is open for application! <https://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/E33m5ahXoAI1ZJN.jpg>
attachments.text: Hey folks - we're mega excited to announce that round four of our open research training program is open for application!

elements.text: 16 week mentoring/training program in Open Research, for people with a project that they either are already working on or want to develop during this program individually or in teams. Project ideas can range from solving technical questions  to creating an open data project or report, developing an open source software project, writing an open publication, facilitating community/team culture movements, advancing open educational resources or contributing to other existing projects/communities.
